title: A warning to come out of Babylon, in a sermon preached by Master Andrew Ramsay, minister at Edinburgh; at the receiving of Mr. Thomas Abernethie, sometime Jesuite, into the societie of the truely reformed Church of Scotland
author: Ramsay, Andrew, 1574-1660.
publisher: In King James his College, by George Anderson,
notes: Running title reads: A warning to come out of Babel.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
